title: India to be 'engine of green energy growth': MNRE Minister Pralhad Joshi
description: India aims to be a major player in green energy with a projected electrolyser capacity of 100 GW by 2030. Minister Joshi highlights the importance of green hydrogen in decarbonising various sectors. The country has shown significant growth in renewable energy capacity under the Prime Minister's leadership.
